Bom jogo, gráficos bons, música ok, história ok... é praticamente tudo ok, não tenho muito o que dizer, vou fazer algumas observações

Prós do jogo: O que eu disse acima, esta em pt-br ou pt-pt (Português de Portugal), tem mapas extras, conquistas de bom tamanho, dificuldade varia a cada fase que você passa, pode ser difícil ou não

Desvantagens: Loading um pouco demorado (provavelmente varia entre pcs), poucas fases (mas pelo menos tem fases extras), não tem co-op/online, curto (pelo menos pra mim), por volta de 2.30 ou 3 horas de jogo

Nota: 7.5/10, zerei de uma vez só

Portal! Blue and Orange, what a concept for a game.

It would be a shame, if you were to nip to the loo, do a stinky poo, and forget to put on your shoe

You play as Chell, she is sprightly as a bell. She jumps high in the sky, having fun in the sun! 

Go through the orange portal, come out blue - then say hello to me and you!

Yes! Your reflection, visible in the portal! Now you feel like more than a mere mortal. Now, make your selection, it's not a direction nor a specific direction, nay! Don't be gay and rather choo choo to do a poo poo through the great blue.

Alas! Bring up your cutlass! You have found yourself on the great other side of yonder. There's no time to ponder. Full yourself up by your bootstraps, do a few claps, fill your budgie smugglers, wave to the distant smugglers!

Hang on! Nay are they what you believed them to be. You move closer, allow yourself to see. A captain? Surely not Barbosa. On his knees, surely not to please, heaving and weaving out his innerds onto the sandy ground below! What a poor fellow I doubt he feels mellow after that ordeal, maybe we should provide a yellow bent meal, though do him a favour and take a moment to peel. 

No sooner can you assist the man with no plan obviously in the pan shitting out into can without a single fan in the crowd, does a hand place on his shoulder.

You see another sailor, perhaps he's a bailer? His hand firmly clasped the sick sailors silly stiff shoulder and uttered a phrase.

What would it be said me? A phrase? A demiglaze from his lips to your ears perhaps?! 

Just before the man spoke he turned to you agasp, soon after his hands went to his chest, clasp

'By God Chells, you're here? Ring the balls and tell the world: If it smells it sells!"
All i wanted was some damn cake, man

The devs went a bit too far in the challenge maps in my opinion, but aside from that this is a great game to buy. Every challenge gets harder the more you progress.

The advanced chambers are one of the hardest chambers. They're the chambers you'd expect from the story, but with a hard mashup, like the floor being full of water, a companion cube becoming a sphere instead of a shaped box, and droids that can't be taken down in cages. Makes everything hard inside, but possible if you put your mind into it.

The challenge maps are basically the same chambers as well, but with hard goals. Three goals, less portals made, less steps made, and less time spent. I'd find the less portals part the easiest of them all since you can take your time on it and think about where you're heading. Hardest are the steps believe it or not. Those are the REAL painkillers since you gotta watch your steps at all cost possible. They're rare to complete but fun doing so (if besides by throwing your pc to the window).

So all in all? Even as a short game, it's still quite fun to enjoy and makes you want more in the second portal game!

No soy el critico más experimentado pero puedo decir con certeza de que a medida que jugaba este juego, más me parecía una obra maestra, desde el diseño de niveles y puzzles, hasta los diálogos, que te hacían sentir empatía, complejos y angustia por robots, el trabajo de como humanizaron a los mismos haciendolos por ejemplo, gritar cuando les pegabas o, decirte "No te odio.." es realmente clave para el final, porque quieras o no, construyes una relación de empatía con piezas y engranajes.

Portal is an excellent puzzle game, and this is coming from someone who usually doesn't find puzzle games to be that exciting. When you first load in the game, you start in a glass cell, and it's clear that you're being put through some sort of test. The game also does not hold your hand at all, but it tells you what you have to do without showing you how to do it. The environment of the game is mysterious and eerie. The entire time you feel as if you're being watched while the game makes you feel isolated. I don't want to say anything else because the fun of this game comes as you learn more and more about this facility your in.

Buy it. It's fun.

Muy buen juego, en cuanto a jugabilidad le doy un 9/10, los controles son fáciles de aprender, en cuanto a historia le doy un 10/10, la verdad que es algo original y muy entretenida, me gusta la idea de que la única interacción en todo el juego sea un robot y que demuestre emociones humanas, que en todo momento trate de engañarnos (aunque sea obvio), recalca que todo lo que sabe lo aprendió de humanos y demuestra que tan terribles pueden llegar a ser las personas (ya que todo lo que expresa se basa en emociones humanas). Lo único que me desagrado del juego es lo corta que es su campaña, me la termine en unas horas, pero para compensar eso  están los niveles avanzados y los comentarios de desarrolladores, lo que le da al juego un mayor tiempo de vida y contenido. 10/10.
Игра топ купил за 51 руб. Всем советую пройти)
